name: Feed for TikTok
author: Sabin Mehedin

sections.description:
TikTok has become one of the most powerful social media platforms. For this reason today you can enjoy a super plugin through which you can display the feed of your TikTok account directly on the website. This plugin has a 100% customizable version for Elementor.

The feed will be displayed in carousel format.

This plugin offers you the possibility to display the general information of your account such as the number of followers, the number of people you follow, the number of likes, the number of videos, etc.

Does this plugin help you? Buy me a coffee

Highlights

  • Good for influencers
  • Get more followers
  • 100% customizable: colors, show / hide the information in each widget / shortcode
  • 3 different layouts
  • Responsive to mobile devices
  • WPML Ready
  • Easy to set up and use
  • Optimized API: include features to cache data, to minimize the requests and reduce loading time
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Feed for TikTok”
  3. Click “Install”
  4. Go to Tik Tok in your admin dashboard
  5. Click the Connect to the API button
  6. Configure your TikTok feed
  7. Press “Save” button and then copy & paste your shortcode in any page or post or use elementor widgets
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 – 2021.05.06

Added transition for all inactive covers on horizontal carousel feed
Created new layer: vertical carousel feed
Created translation for Romania

1.0.1 – 2021.05.04

Integrated Bootstrap 5 Framework
Changed design for video popup
Now, you can go to the next or previous video when the popup is open

1.0.0 – 2021.04.29

Initial Release

short_description: Displays the feed of any user on TikTok plus account information. Available for Elementor and shortcode.
